name: We Let It Out
description:
Part of a science team something terrible has happened to the lab and you were thrown into an empty cargo room. You wake up only to find the lights out and some strange round objects roam the place. Maybe you should have left that planet alone.

There is only one way out but the doors are sealed shut, find clues from the other scientists log entries to gain access to different levels and get to the exit. But be careful, it knows you are there.
